name: Coffee Quest Test Demo
description:
A small demo showing some progress of a game I'm working on. This is a very early version of the game so don't expect much from it. Realy just a tec-demo with some models  and music I made.

Keyboard Controlls :

WASD to  move

Space to jump

Left Click to Attack

Right Click to Block

Mouse to move the camera

Esc to Pause

Controller Controlls:

Left Stick to  move

B to jump

Y  to Attack

Left Shoulder Button   to Block

Right Stick to move the camera

Start to Pause
